success_criteria: alt attribute is missing in iframe or img tag

error_fixes.problem_type: alt attribute is missing in img tag
error_fixes.offending_line: <input type="number" alt="quantity" id="quantity" name="quantity" min="1" required>
error_fixes.fixed_line: <input type="number" alt="Quantity of Tickets" id="quantity" name="quantity" min="1" required>

success_criteria: input element or button is missing an associated label, it contains an alt attribute, or its label is empty

error_fixes.problem_type: input element is missing an associated label
error_fixes.offending_line: <input type="number" alt="quantity" id="quantity" name="quantity" min="1" required>
error_fixes.fixed_line:
<label for="quantity">Number of Tickets:</label>
<input type="number" id="quantity" name="quantity" min="1" required>

error_fixes.problem_type: input element or button is missing an associated label or its label is empty

success_criteria: Audio or video element should avoid automatically playing audio
fixed_example:
<video controls>
<source src="bookstore-video.mp4" type="video/mp4">
Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>

success_criteria: <b> <i> or <font> tag should not be used
onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible

error_fixes.problem_type: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible
error_fixes.offending_line: <button type="button" onclick="submitForm()" style="background-color: #45a049;"> <!-- Adjusted background color for better contrast -->
error_fixes.fixed_line: <button type="button" onclick="submitForm()" onkeydown="if(event.key === 'Enter'){ submitForm(); }" style="background-color: #45a049;"> <!-- Adjusted background color for better contrast -->

success_criteria: meta refresh with a time-out is used.

error_fixes.problem_type: Meta refresh with a time-out is used.
Meta refresh with a time-out is used

success_criteria: document language not identified or incorrect
input element has more than one associated label

error_fixes.problem_type: input element has more than one associated label
error_fixes.offending_line: <input type="number" alt="quantity" id="quantity" name="quantity" min="1" required>
error_fixes.fixed_line: <input type="number" alt="quantity" id="quantity" name="quantity" min="1" required aria-labelledby="quantity-label">

success_criteria: element does not have complete start and end tags or id attribute is not unique

error_fixes.problem_type: Element does not have complete start and end tags
